p: An evaluation of simulations of Asian summer monsoon from 25 CMIP5 and 22 CMIP3 simulations of the late twentieth Century was reported in terms of time-mean, climatological annual cycle, interannual variability, and intraseasonal variability 10. However, no comparative evaluation in terms of trends was reported. Besides, as noted earlier, the characteristics for CIM can be very different from those for a larger system like the Asian monsoon. Certain improvements, such as in simulation of seasonality, have been reported in CMIP5 over CMIP3 15, with most CMIP5 models correctly simulating very low rainfall rates outside of the monsoon season.
